Name: Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator
About the game: Ever wanted a relaxing game to play while watching movies, or just to distract yourself? Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator is simple, calming game to play when stressed, or while you're watching movies in the background. It features a freeroam mode, where you can freely roam in a wide field of grass to mow, while listening to the sound of distant waves and birds. Additionally, you can play the 'Challenge' mode, where you have to mow various residents lawns in time before they get annoyed at you taking too long.
